title: Opposition and Perseverance
summary: Enemies mock and threaten the work. Nehemiah prays and posts guards while the people continue building. Despite growing pressure, the builders work with weapons in hand, trusting God to defend them.

faq.question: How did Nehemiah respond to threats?
faq.answer: He prayed, set a guard, and encouraged the people to trust and keep building.

faq.question: How did the people build under threat?
faq.answer: With one hand they worked, and with the other they held weapons.
